Resolved Question Show me another » What would you do if McDonalds wouldnt serve...your kind? I went to McDonalds and the secruity guard told the cashier not to serve me.. So i asked why and she said because....and then i said is it because im Muslim? ( I KNOW that came at of nowhere, but i just wanted to ask, to make sure it's true...) and she said no its becausee im a theif. And because i put soda in the water cup. ( I HAVE NEVER DONE THAT!!!) i said you most be mistaken me for someelse because i never did it. And then she sais no, it was you. Like she was sooo sure of it! So i left. I know its not because im muslim...what should i do? 1 year ago Report Abuse by WallyZ Member since: May 08, 2007 Total points: 96,506 (Level 7) Badge Image: Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker >she said no its becausee im a [thief]... <because she thinks you are a republican?????
You did not mention it but do you normally drink water instead of soda? You should insist that they call a manager so you can speak with him/her. Calmly and politely state your case with the manager. Point out that the guard could not have seen you specifically put soda in unless she had been standing there and observed that you did not press the little water lever/button which is on the same dispenser as the soda. The guard's job is to observe and report, the most the guard could do is to catch you in the act and report it to the manager. Then it is up to the manager whether to ban you or not. z Edited 1 year ago Report Abuse Asker's Rating: Asker's Comment: ;) Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting!
